definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Andersen also wrote travelogs4 while he traveled through different countries.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生在周游列国时也写了游记。

sentences.english: The Little Mermaid is one of Anderson's more moving fairytales.
sentences.chinese: “美人鱼”是安徒生比较感人的童话故事之一。

sentences.english: Little Mermaid is an old fairytale written by Hans Christian Andersen.
sentences.chinese: 美人鱼是安徒生写的一个古老童话。

sentences.english: Today is the 136 anniversary of Andersen , father of fairy tale.
sentences.chinese: 今天是“童话之父”安徒生去世136周年。

sentences.english: Andersen also wrote travelogs while he traveled through different countries.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生在周游列国时也写了游记。

sentences.english: When he was eleven, his father died.
The award is the highest international recognition given to living authors and illustrators of children's books for their whole body of work.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生奖是对儿童文学作者和插画者的最高国际认可。

sentences.english: The littlematch girl in Andersen's fairy tale is just a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生童话里卖火柴的小女孩就是这样一个例子。

sentences.english: "Primers moisturize and smooth the skin, " says Reiss-Andersen.
sentences.chinese: “底霜能滋润和平滑肌肤，”里斯安徒生说。

sentences.english: Danish writer Hans Christian Andersen's stories have been translated into about 150 languages.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦作家安徒生的故事被翻译成约150种语言。

sentences.english: The plot of this novel is the basis of many of Andersen's works.
sentences.chinese: 这本小说的情节是安徒生许多作品的根基。

sentences.english: Andersen proposed to several women during his life and was rejected by all of them.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生一生中曾向几位女士求过婚，却都遭到了拒绝。

sentences.english: On the right side, opposite of the City Hall, is the statue of Andersen in Tivoli Park.
sentences.chinese: 市政厅对面右侧，是面对着趣伏里公园的安徒生雕像。

sentences.english: See the Anderson fairy tale of the little match girl, my tears.
sentences.chinese: 看了安徒生童话的卖火柴的小女孩后，我不禁落泪了。

sentences.english: Collin was able to obtain money from the king for Andersen's education.
sentences.chinese: 科林能够从国王那里拿到一笔钱以支持安徒生的学业。

definition: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov (1860-1904), Russian writer famous for his short stories and plays
Guy de Maupassant (1850-1893), French novelist and short story writer
Gustave Flaubert (1821-1880), French realist novelist, author of Madame Bovary
Maugham (family name)/W. Somerset Maugham (1874-1965), English writer
Henrik Ibsen (1828-1906), Norwegian dramatist, author of Doll's House 玩偶之家
Mark Twain (Samuel Langhorne Clemens 1835-1910), US writer, novelist and humorist, author of Adventures of Huckleberry Finn 哈克貝利·芬歷險記|哈克贝利·芬历险记[Ha1 ke4 bei4 li4 · Fen1 Li4 xian3 Ji4]
